ZIG_ZAG.Info: Cold-calling: You respond to someone contacting you out of the blue to move their pension

SPLITTER.Info: Offered withdrawal: Transfer your pension to a scheme because they offer you early access to your pension

ACCELERATOR.Info: Accelerator: You engaged with a company because they offered you free financial advice
ACCELERATOR.Icon: pound signs with a cross through it

BLACK_OUT.Info: Black out: You engaged with a company because they offered a unique or limited investment opportunity

SPEEDY.Info: Speedy: You agree to something because you are told the offer has a time limit on it

DIAGONAL.Info: Diagonal: Fake scammer vigilantes working on peopleâ€™s fear of scams to get them to move their pension

NORMAL_SCAM.Info: Normal Scam: High returns with low risk

NORMAL_BOON.Info: Normal Boon: Check FCA registered - get FCA number

INVISIBLITY_BOON.Info: Invisiblity Boon: Ask to sleep on your decision/ think about it

LIFE_BOON.Info: Life Boon: Check with current provider before transferring
